title: What Are The Dangers Of A Ouija Board? | Paranormal Stories
description:
Today on another horrifying episode of real ghost stories online.

When a young child first encounters a Ouija board at the age of seven, she had no idea the deep and dark impact it would have on her life going forward. 

Noises, voices, spirits, sounds and feelings that cannot be explained would start to follow and torment her day after day well into adulthood. 

Is there a way to make these visits with the dead stop? 

Or was a door opened, that can never be closed again? 

We ask that question today, On Real Ghost Stories Online.

To hear more real ghost stories, become a supporter of our show and get every episode, including our weekly bonus episodes at http://www.ghostpodcast.com or http://www.patreon.com/realghoststories

Watch more at: http://www.realghoststoriesonline.com/
